ygData.subject: Re:Still here...just lost time.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I have been reading off and on since the board began...despite computer crashes, etc. My main character is on Lans T val Server, Lvl 20 Barbarian Shaman
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, I have been reading off and on since the board began...despite
computer crashes, etc. My main character is on Lans T'val Server, Lvl 20
Barbarian Shaman Deneyu Firnloch. Sorry, my other characters are on Eci
and The Seventh Hammer. I enjoy chatting when I can, but I work, raise 2
teenagers and care for older parents. My EQ playtime is my only spot of
R & R, so I hurry through the mail a lot. I started my characters at the
beginning of the game, and I still enjoy playing. Mainly, because I am
not rushing through my EQ life, trying to powerlevel, twinking or
rushing the storyline. Deneyu has finally earned her chainmail through
earnest efforts. She often will expend her whole mana reserves, healing
the needy adventurers that she meets. She has too often, been placed in
jeopardy from less cautious hunting partners, so while Deneyu has made
many friends but perfers to hunt alone. Lately, she has been hunting in
the LavaStorm, but is happy to even just explore the environment around
her without worrying about kills.
Sometimes I also play my level 17 High Elf Enchanter Yadienu on Eci or
my new baby lvl 12 Halfling Druid Whirlwinda on Seventh Hammer. While I
have other characters created, these are my most often played ones. If
you are on any of these servers let me know, I am always happy to meet
new folk.
Meet you on EQ....
Donna C.
